name: A Slime's Chance in Hell
description:
My submission for the 2019 Game Maker's Toolkit jam.  Play as a slime, condemned to the depths of Hell but determined to escape by any means.  But with jumping your only mode of movement and demons constantly approaching, this journey becomes more difficult than it would seem.

The theme of this game jam is only one, which is demonstrated in the game by the lack of ability to perform multiple actions at once.  You may do only one thing at a time.  Choose between jumping, placing torches to see enemies, collecting keys to escape or fighting demons.

Will you survive, or will you waste slime's one chance in Hell?

#gmtkjam
